summary: Walt Disney World, located in Florida, is a huge entertainment resort. It opened in 1971 and covers about 25,000 acres. The resort has four theme parks, water parks, golf courses, hotels, and more. It was Walt Disney's idea to build a bigger park than Disneyland in California. After Walt's death, his brother Roy made sure the project happened. The first park, Magic Kingdom, opened in 1971. Today, it's the most visited resort in the world, with over 58 million guests each year.
title: Walt Disney World
